channel.itunes:subtitle: Latest news updates from HindustanTimes.com for ANALYSIS. For more updates hop on to HindustanTimes.com.

item.title: Dina Nath Batra did not hold a gun to anyones head
item.description: Dina Nath Batra approached the court with his objections and won much to the chagrin of his ideological detractors a coterie with a false sense of entitlement not used to defeat or having its ideas trashed writes Vivek Gumaste
item.itunes:subtitle: Dina Nath Batra approached the court with his objections and won much to the chagrin of his ideological detractors a coterie with a false sense of entitlement not used to defeat or having its ideas trashed writes Vivek Gumaste
item.itunes:summary: Dina Nath Batra approached the court with his objections and won much to the chagrin of his ideological detractors a coterie with a false sense of entitlement not used to defeat or having its ideas trashed writes Vivek Gumaste

item.title: Religion is not a commodity to be controlled or sold
item.description: Being secular and democratic India needs to treat history for what it is factbased and allow religion in its multiple forms to be studied or practised as a means to define freedom of faith and expression
item.itunes:subtitle: Being secular and democratic India needs to treat history for what it is factbased and allow religion in its multiple forms to be studied or practised as a means to define freedom of faith and expression
item.itunes:summary: Being secular and democratic India needs to treat history for what it is factbased and allow religion in its multiple forms to be studied or practised as a means to define freedom of faith and expression

item.title: The judiciary has failed the judiciary
item.description: The passage of the two Bills that aim to replace the collegium system with a NJAC has led to the formation of two camps While one camp feels that the judiciary will cease to be independent the other believes that the executive has corrected an anomaly
item.itunes:subtitle: The passage of the two Bills that aim to replace the collegium system with a NJAC has led to the formation of two camps While one camp feels that the judiciary will cease to be independent the other believes that the executive has corrected an anomaly
item.itunes:summary: The passage of the two Bills that aim to replace the collegium system with a NJAC has led to the formation of two camps While one camp feels that the judiciary will cease to be independent the other believes that the executive has corrected an anomaly

item.title: Felling laws for environment from Manmohans govt to Modis
item.description: All mining industrial and related projects will be given the green signal causing widespread distress to those who pay the price of such unmonitored growth writes Darryl DMonte
item.itunes:subtitle: All mining industrial and related projects will be given the green signal causing widespread distress to those who pay the price of such unmonitored growth writes Darryl DMonte
item.itunes:summary: All mining industrial and related projects will be given the green signal causing widespread distress to those who pay the price of such unmonitored growth writes Darryl DMonte

item.title: Listen to Irom Sharmila repeal AFSPA
item.description: Irom Sharmilasnbsprelease underlines once again something that the state or the Centre has been unable to grasp she is not keen on taking her life she is making a political point which is to repeal the AFSPA writes KumKum Dasgupta
item.itunes:subtitle: Irom Sharmilasnbsprelease underlines once again something that the state or the Centre has been unable to grasp she is not keen on taking her life she is making a political point which is to repeal the AFSPA writes KumKum Dasgupta
item.itunes:summary: Irom Sharmilasnbsprelease underlines once again something that the state or the Centre has been unable to grasp she is not keen on taking her life she is making a political point which is to repeal the AFSPA writes KumKum Dasgupta

item.title: Democracy without dissent serves no cause
item.description: For the BJP the only obstacle in the way of steamrolling its majoritarian policies is an officially recognised Opposition party that can expose the governments intentions This is the essence of its strategy to isolate the Congress in the Lok Sabha
item.itunes:subtitle: For the BJP the only obstacle in the way of steamrolling its majoritarian policies is an officially recognised Opposition party that can expose the governments intentions This is the essence of its strategy to isolate the Congress in the Lok Sabha
item.itunes:summary: For the BJP the only obstacle in the way of steamrolling its majoritarian policies is an officially recognised Opposition party that can expose the governments intentions This is the essence of its strategy to isolate the Congress in the Lok Sabha

item.title: IndoPakistan ties Needed tact not tantrums
item.description: Waging peace is way more difficult than waging war in these times of conflict That explains the Narendra Modi regimes safer shortterm option of calling off talks with Pakistan writes Vinod Sharma

item.title: Suspension of IndoPak talks have repercussions for Kashmir
item.description: Since the IndoPak talks have been suspended and it is difficult to see how they can be resumed in the absence thus far of any back channel diplomacy over a meeting between Basit and separatist leader Shabir Shah there are consequences for Kashmir
item.itunes:subtitle: Since the IndoPak talks have been suspended and it is difficult to see how they can be resumed in the absence thus far of any back channel diplomacy over a meeting between Basit and separatist leader Shabir Shah there are consequences for Kashmir
item.itunes:summary: Since the IndoPak talks have been suspended and it is difficult to see how they can be resumed in the absence thus far of any back channel diplomacy over a meeting between Basit and separatist leader Shabir Shah there are consequences for Kashmir

item.title: After Monday dual peace process with Islamabad and Srinagar now uncertain
item.description: If earlier India believed there were differences between civilians and the military intelligence combine in Pakistan and that its key aim ought to be strengthening the civilian government Modi has shown he is not interested in internal political equations in Pakistan

item.title: RSS Hindutva rhetoric puts PM Modi on sticky wicket
item.description: The RSS rising Hindutva rhetoric may be aimed at making gains in several electionbound states but it also turns the heat on Prime Minister Narendra Modi at a time when parts of north and central India are witnessing a spurt in lowlevel communal violence analysts say
item.itunes:subtitle: The RSS rising Hindutva rhetoric may be aimed at making gains in several electionbound states but it also turns the heat on Prime Minister Narendra Modi at a time when parts of north and central India are witnessing a spurt in lowlevel communal violence a
item.itunes:summary: The RSS rising Hindutva rhetoric may be aimed at making gains in several electionbound states but it also turns the heat on Prime Minister Narendra Modi at a time when parts of north and central India are witnessing a spurt in lowlevel communal violence analysts say

item.title: Law and order machinery in UP is unable to cope with challenges
item.description: The fragility of intercommunity ties as well as law and order in west UP came to the fore once again in Loni town of Ghaziabad In incident after incident the issue of gender either violence against a woman or a need to save her honor plays a part
item.itunes:subtitle: The fragility of intercommunity ties as well as law and order in west UP came to the fore once again in Loni town of Ghaziabad In incident after incident the issue of gender either violence against a woman or a need to save her honor plays a part

item.title: After a series of Uturns Goa turns Right
item.description: The twoandahalf years of the BJP led coalition government in Goa are known for Uturns on key policy pledges on mining casinos and failure to deliver on the promise of corruptionfree good governance
item.itunes:subtitle: The twoandahalf years of the BJP led coalition government in Goa are known for Uturns on key policy pledges on mining casinos and failure to deliver on the promise of corruptionfree good governance
item.itunes:summary: The twoandahalf years of the BJP led coalition government in Goa are known for Uturns on key policy pledges on mining casinos and failure to deliver on the promise of corruptionfree good governance

item.title: Chinas dream our nightmare
item.description: As Indias new government gets down to the task of governance and crafting a national strategic policy it needs to take a fresh look at the countrys relationship with China writes Jayadeva Ranade
item.itunes:subtitle: As Indias new government gets down to the task of governance and crafting a national strategic policy it needs to take a fresh look at the countrys relationship with China writes Jayadeva Ranade
item.itunes:summary: As Indias new government gets down to the task of governance and crafting a national strategic policy it needs to take a fresh look at the countrys relationship with China writes Jayadeva Ranade

item.title: Controversies galore Arjuna Awards panel seldom hits target plumb
item.description: By belittling sportspersons to pander to influence instead of achievement the Arjuna committees have done great disservice to the sporting community over the years writes Sukhwant Basra
item.itunes:subtitle: By belittling sportspersons to pander to influence instead of achievement the Arjuna committees have done great disservice to the sporting community over the years writes Sukhwant Basra
item.itunes:summary: By belittling sportspersons to pander to influence instead of achievement the Arjuna committees have done great disservice to the sporting community over the years writes Sukhwant Basra

item.title: Guardians of the Galaxy marks the advent of rogue superheroes
item.description: An outlaw a green assassin a tattooed wrestler a raccoon and a tree set out to steal a decorated orb but end up forming an improbable fellowship of superheroes in the exquisite film Guardians of the Galaxy which is set in alien worlds
item.itunes:subtitle: An outlaw a green assassin a tattooed wrestler a raccoon and a tree set out to steal a decorated orb but end up forming an improbable fellowship of superheroes in the exquisite film Guardians of the Galaxy which is set in alien worlds
